name: Squid Game (itch) (Urooj.Mubashir)
description:
“Squid Game” is a survival game, So basically there are 5 Levels in this game, and if you lost any of one level then the door of darkness will be opened, It is a deadly dangerous game no second chance for life and if you succeeded to pass all the levels then you become a billionaire.

All levels are different from each other. And in each level, there will be a sprite that will guide you that what is the task and what you need to do in it.
